  • Materials: Grey Fabric, Iron Frame, Woven Cotton Back, Steam Beech Wood
  • Finish: Natural Finish
  • Usage: Indoors and Semi Outdoors
  • Made in India

furniture.Name: Theo Armchair - Cotton
furniture.Body:
A stunning armchair featuring a solid wood frame and masterful joinery. The Theo is very comfortable to sit in and its upholstered seat peeks through its frame. The chair comes in a variety of fabrics that contrast nicely with the tone of the wood.

  • Product Dimensions: 26" W x 30" D x 36" H
  • Seat Dimensions: 21" W x 19" D x 19" H
  • Materials: Cotton Fabric, Acacia Wood
  • Finish: Teak Finish
  • Made in India

furniture.Name: Theo Armchair - Dhurrie
furniture.Body:
A stunning armchair featuring a solid wood frame and masterful joinery. The Theo is very comfortable to sit in and its upholstered seat peeks through its frame. The chair comes in a variety of fabrics that contrast nicely with the tone of the wood.

furniture.Name: Arbor Coffee Table
furniture.Body:
Bring a taste of what’s trending to your living room layout with this modern coffee table. Crafted from metal, its frame features a circular base in a gold finish for a hint of glamour. The circular tops are made from high-grade wood and finished with a durable mahogany polish.

This coffee table is ideal for those who want a multi-functional product that complements an evolving, modern lifestyle. It offers extra storage with layered tables, and can be paired with almost any style of sofa.

  • Product Dimensions: Small Table: 24" DIA x 19" H, Large Table: 33" DIA x 16" H
  • Materials: Veneer Top, Iron Frame
  • Finish: Mahogany Polish, Gold [Metal Paint]
  • Made in India

furniture.Name: Larsen Coffee Table
furniture.Body:
Characterised by its clean lines and open design, this understated coffee table brings a touch of modern minimalism to your living room.

For fans of all things mid-century modern, this table is sure to deliver. Built from solid wood, this table features a streamlined design with retro curved legs and painted gold metal inserts. A lower shelf offers out-of-sight storage for odds and ends you want to tuck away while the top has enough space for an entertainment spread.

Please note: **Due to the wood’s natural graining, each piece is one-of-a-kind. **

  • Product Dimensions: Table: 48" W x 21" D x 16" H
  • Materials : Veneer + Solid Wood Frame, Metal Inserts
  • Finish : Walnut Polish, Gold [Metal Paint]
  • Made in India

furniture.Name: Tyler Bedside Table
furniture.Body:
A great looking piece that is crafted in solid wood and will stand the test of time. Clean lines, sleek design and plenty of storage.

Details are subtle but expressive and nothing has been overlooked. Did we mention the hand made curved handle?

  • Product Dimensions: 24" W x 20" D x 20" H
  • Materials: Veneer + Solid Wood
  • Finish: Teak Polish [Customisable]
  • Made in India

furniture.Name: Jesse Bedside Table
furniture.Body:
Jesse is an effortless fusion between mid-century modern and deco styles. Its beautiful curves are elegant and subtle.

The design is complemented with a gorgeous brass gold handle, resulting in a bedside table with serious style. Additionally, Jesse has enough storage to hold all your bedside bits and bobs.

  • Product Dimensions: 18" W x 14" D x 21" H
  • Materials: Solid Wood
  • Finish: Teak Polish [Customisable]
  • Made in India

furniture.Name: Maya Bedside Table
furniture.Body:
Designed with your bedroom in mind, Maya has your bedside storage needs sorted.

Think honed teak finish with a subtle contrast from the metal frame, this bedside table has it all.

  • Product Dimensions: 31" W x 18" D x 17" H
  • Materials: Veneer + Solid Wood, Metal Bar
  • Finish: Teak Polish [Customisable], Matt Black [Metal Paint]
  • Made in India

furniture.Name: Ralph Bedside Table
furniture.Body:
Ralph is an instant classic.

Check out the bevelled edging, honed teak finish and all that detail in the grain. Ralph is an effortless way to add sophisticated style to your space.

  • Product Dimensions: 22" W x 20" D x 20" H
  • Materials: Solid Wood
  • Finish: Teak Polish [Customisable]
  • Made in India

furniture.Name: Audrey Armchair
furniture.Body:
Clean lines meet an airy, laid-back vibe. The armless frame with a curved back and a deep comfortable plush seat has a modern look that keeps the silhouette from overwhelming a space. The result? A nod to the classic cocktail chair, with a surprisingly airy look.

  • Product Dimensions: 32" W x 27" D x 33" H
  • Seat Dimensions: 32" W x 21" D x 18.5" H
  • Materials: Butidaar Velvet Fabric, Acacia Wood
  • Wood Finish: Teak Polish
  • Made in India

furniture.Name: Camila Upholstered Coffee Table
furniture.Body:
Discover timeless elegance and old-world luxury in your living space with the Camila Coffee Table. Natural Beige Earthy Fabric upholstery in a tufted finish rests on legs that have a unique design that bridges traditional and contemporary aesthetics.

The Camila has an added bonus of storage space - the perfect hiding place for those extra throws, pillows, and linens.

  • Product Dimensions: 48" W x 24" D x 16" H
  • Materials: Plywood + Laminate Upholstered Box, Steam Beech Wood Legs
  • Finish: Cotton Fabric, Natural Polish
  • Made in India

furniture.Name: Knox Bench
furniture.Body:
Knox is the best of traditional design cut with contemporary touches. Think soft, plush and chic - classic pulled details, premium upholstery and tapered legs. It’s waiting for you to take a seat.

This is a seriously comfortable addition to your bedroom or living area.

  • Dimensions: 64" W x 22" D x 18" H
  • Materials: Textured Velvet Fabric, Steam Beech Wood Legs
  • Finish: Teak Polish
  • Made in India

furniture.Name: Adeline Armchair
furniture.Body:
The rounded arms, a slightly reclined back, and tapered legs add a timeless elegance to the room.

The comfortable seat is just deep enough for a look that’s both inviting and tailored. And to give the shape a fresh update, we chose to upholster it in a gorgeous luxury velvet that can be customised in any colour from our wide catalog of fabrics.

  • Product Dimensions: 32" W x 33" D x 34" H
  • Seat Dimensions: 26" W x 21" D x 18" H
  • Materials: Pink Velvet Fabric, Acacia Wood
  • Finish: Teak Polish
  • Made in India

accents.Name: Elisa Basket
accents.Body:
The Elisa basket has so many uses around the home. Use these elegant brass wire baskets to store your favourite fruit or vegetables, or to organise your hallway or pretty much in any other room.

Our range of wire products are carefully made by hand by experienced craftsmen. The criss-crossing angular wires create interesting detail making it decorative as well as functional.

  • Dimensions: 10.75" DIA x  4.75" H
  • Finish : Brass, Powder Coated
  • Made in India

accents.Name: Geometric Rack - Black
accents.Body:
Declutter your office or home with this unique wall mounted storage geometric rack.

It is a stylish way to give your living space some practical personality and store your magazines, mail and newspapers.

  • Dimensions: 9" W x 2.5" D x 27" H, Space Per Slot: 8"
  • Finish : Black [Powder-Coated]
  • Assembly : Mounting Hardware Included. Hardware may loosen over time, periodically check that all connections are tight.
  • Made in India

accents.Name: Tilly Square Cushion - Indigo
accents.Body:
These hand block printed cushions with strong yet calming tones will make the perfect addition to your interiors. The Diamond, together with the co-ordinating Wave and Tree prints, all have the same calm and serene feel and the range is designed to be mixed together.

Each block-printed cushion is unique, although cushions may be of the same dimensions and shape, the nature of block-printing means no two will be identical!

*Care Instructions: We recommend gentle hand-washing in lukewarm water and drying flat on a towel. The block-printed cover can be ironed on a warm setting, with muslin between the iron and cover.

** Cushion cover only, inside fillers not included.

  • Dimensions: 18" x 18"
  • Material: Cotton Dhurrie
  • Colour: Indigo
  • Made in India

accents.Body:
The Gigi comes with gorgeous multi coloured accent thread work and is great for adding a boho touch to any living space!

This rug comes also comes in a runner size 4 ft x 6 ft.

*Care Instructions: We recommend gentle hand-washing in lukewarm water and drying the rug flat. It can be ironed on a warm setting, with muslin between the iron and the rug. It can also be spot cleaned.

Please note: Products may vary slightly from one example to the next due to the handmade nature of the products. Please also note that the rug will come folded and may have fold creases which will disappear over time.

  • Dimensions: 6 Feet x 2 Feet
  • Material: Cotton Dhurrie
  • Made in India

accents.Name: Shibori Floor Cushion
accents.Body:
This oversized floor cushion is perfect for an occasional perch or for lounging on while reading your favourite book or magazine. The fabric is dyed several times to achieve the deep rich blue. The manual resist Japanese dyeing technique produces the most intricate patterns on the fabric and no Shibori pattern is the same.

  • Dimensions: 22" DIA x 10" H
  • Filling : Foam, Polyfibre
  • Made in India

accents.Name: Zoe Diamond Shelf
accents.Body:
Create a contemporary setting with our Zoe Diamond Shelf - crafted from mango wood, it is a unique diamond shape and has a black iron frame  to complement it. Perfect for displaying your favourite photos, small artwork and other objects of interest.

  • Dimensions: 24" W [middle shelf] , 16" W (top & bottom shelf) 8" D x 24" H
  • Finish : Natural Polish, Black [Powder-Coated]
  • Assembly : Mounting Hardware Included. Hardware may loosen over time, periodically check that all connections are tight.
  • Made in India

accents.Body:
The Alisa is a mix of two of our design favourites - the colour indigo and block printing. The block printed section is added on only one side for striking contrast.

With a simple pattern and the deep indigo colour, the Alisa adds interest without over-complicating.

*Care Instructions: We recommend gentle hand-washing in lukewarm water and drying the rug flat. It can be ironed on a warm setting, with muslin between the iron and the rug. It can also be spot cleaned.

  • Dimensions: 6 Feet x 4 Feet
  • Material: Cotton Dhurrie

mirrors.Name: Matilda Brass - Medium
mirrors.Body:
Simple hand-beveled round mirror that reflects edgy glamour in antique brass/pewter. Wall mirrors make spaces appear larger, brightening a room by reflecting natural light.

We love the Matilda in the entryway, bedroom, an empty corner–we can't think of a room it won't improve.

  • Dimensions: Diameter - 30", Thickness - 1.5"
  • Finish: Antique Brass [Powder Coated]
  • Assembly: Welded slotted plate helps secure the mirror to the wall and support its weight.
  • Made in India

Both architectural and functional. A mirror that looks simply stunning anywhere it goes.

mirrors.Name: Miriam Mirror
mirrors.Body:
Effortless and subtle, yet still a total standout – there are so many reasons this floor mirror is a great idea for almost any room in the house. Made with high-grade metal, the frame’s clean lines allow the mirror to seamlessly blend into your space while also making its claim as a focal point. Perfect for an entry, bedroom, living space, dressing area or anywhere you want to add a bit of unexpected style.

The tall, narrow shape creates a sense of height in rooms and the mirror is practical, as well as beautiful.

  • Dimensions: 19.5" W x 60" H x 1.5" T
  • Finish: Antique Brass [Powder Coated]
  • Assembly: Welded slotted plate helps secure the mirror to the wall and support its weight.
  • Made in India

poufs-ottomans.Name: Harriet Pouf
poufs-ottomans.Body:
The Harriet has gorgeous velvet upholstery and is a comfortable seat or perfect place to put your feet up. Its cylindrical shape is upholstered in four colours and its handsome walnut-veneered base adds to the appeal.

Use in front of a dresser or as additional seating in a living room. The design is an easy fit for a vintage, modern or contemporary styled interior.

Colours Available: Pink, Green, Grey & Blue Velvet

  • Product Dimensions: 16" DIA x 20" H
  • Materials : Velvet Fabric, Acacia Base
  • Finish : Teak Polish
  • Made in India

poufs-ottomans.Body:
Simple and striking, it's all in the detail with the Elvi. Sleek solid wood frame, Timeless Monochrome Fabric. Go on, feet up. Or use as an extra seat for guests – this pouf excels at multitasking. All you need to do is relax. 

The pouf can be used as extra seating, in a dressing area, or as an accent piece.

  • Product Dimensions: 18" DIA x 18" H
  • Materials: Monochrome Stripe Fabric, Acacia Legs

poufs-ottomans.Body:
The Jasper Pouf elevates a classic pouf with beautiful digitally printed fabric and a brass metallic frame. The antique brass finish combined with a gorgeous vintage print is perfect to create design drama in a room.

The pouf can be used as extra seating, in a dressing area, or as an accent piece.

  • Overall Product Dimensions: 16" DIA x 16" H
  • Materials:Digital Print Fabric, MS Frame
  • Finish: Antique Brass [Powder Coated]
  • Made in India

poufs-ottomans.Name: Jasper Ottoman - Monochrome
poufs-ottomans.Body:
The Jasper Ottoman elevates a classic ottoman shape with beautiful monochrome fabric and powder coated black metallic legs. The finishing touch to any Scandi style space - the metallic finish combined with the monochrome will give your room serious style.

The ottoman can be used as extra seating, as a coffee table, or as an accent piece.

  • Dimensions: 30" DIA x 17" H
  • Material: Monochrome Stripe Fabric, MS Frame
  • Finish: Matt Black [Powder Coated]
  • Made in India

poufs-ottomans.Name: Jasper Ottoman - Velvet

seating.Name: Abra Bench - Ikat
seating.Body:
Drawing on mid century influences, our Abra Ikat bench will contribute an instant sophisticated touch to an array of living settings. The delicate, tapered walnut legs contrast with the gorgeous hand woven Ikat fabric.

The bench serves as an excellent extra seating option that promises current, unique style.

  • Dimensions: 48" W x 16" D x 20" H
  • Material: Handwoven Ikat Fabric, Acacia Wood
  • Wood Finish: Walnut Polish
  • Assembly: Minimal assembly required, the bench comes flat packed with screw-on legs. [No additional tools required]
  • Made in India

ASSEMMBLY INSTRUCTIONS

seating.Name: Adeline Armchair
seating.Body:
The rounded arms, a slightly reclined back, and tapered legs add a timeless elegance to the room.

The comfortable seat is just deep enough for a look that’s both inviting and tailored. And to give the shape a fresh update, we chose to upholster it in a gorgeous luxury velvet that can be customised in any colour from our wide catalog of fabrics.

  • Product Dimensions: 32" W x 33" D x 34" H
  • Seat Dimensions: 26" W x 21" D x 18" H
  • Materials: Pink Velvet Fabric, Acacia Wood
  • Finish: Teak Polish
  • Made in India

seating.Name: Audrey Armchair
seating.Body:
Clean lines meet an airy, laid-back vibe. The armless frame with a curved back and a deep comfortable plush seat has a modern look that keeps the silhouette from overwhelming a space. The result? A nod to the classic cocktail chair, with a surprisingly airy look.

  • Product Dimensions: 32" W x 27" D x 33" H
  • Seat Dimensions: 32" W x 21" D x 18.5" H
  • Materials: Butidaar Velvet Fabric, Acacia Wood
  • Wood Finish: Teak Polish

seating.Body:

The chair is upholstered in soft plush velvet to give it an additional layer of sophistication.

storage.Body:
The Elisa basket has so many uses around the home. Use these elegant brass wire baskets to store your favourite fruit or vegetables, or to organise your hallway or pretty much in any other room.

Our range of wire products are carefully made by hand by experienced craftsmen. The criss-crossing angular wires create interesting detail making it decorative as well as functional.

  • Dimensions: 10.75" DIA x  4.75" H
  • Finish : Brass, Powder Coated

storage.Name: Finley Shelf
storage.Body:
This unusual shelf  is very versatile - use it by your bedside to store a bottle of water and other essential items. Use it in your balcony to display your favourite greens or create a cosy reading corner by displaying your current  reads  and  settle back into your favourite armchair and relax!

storage.Body:
Declutter your office or home with this unique wall mounted storage geometric rack.

It is a stylish way to give your living space some practical personality and store your magazines, mail and newspapers.

  • Dimensions: 9" W x 2.5" D x 27" H, Space Per Slot: 8"
  • Finish : Black [Powder-Coated]
  • Assembly : Mounting Hardware Included. Hardware may loosen over time, periodically check that all connections are tight.
  • Made in India

storage.Name: Grid Rack - Black
storage.Body:
Our Grid Wall Rack is perfect for storing and displaying your favourite items in the kitchen, living room or a home office. The compact and versatile frame comes with three large sections which can hold books, newspapers and other items with ease.

  • Dimensions: 26" W x 5.25" D x 12" H, Space Per Slot: 8.5"
  • Finish : Black [Powder-Coated]
  • Assembly : Mounting Hardware Included. Hardware may loosen over time, periodically check that all connections are tight.
  • Made in India

storage.Name: Zoe Diamond Shelf
storage.Body:
Create a contemporary setting with our Zoe Diamond Shelf - crafted from mango wood, it is a unique diamond shape and has a black iron frame  to complement it. Perfect for displaying your favourite photos, small artwork and other objects of interest.

  • Dimensions: 24" W [middle shelf] , 16" W (top & bottom shelf) 8" D x 24" H
  • Finish : Natural Polish, Black [Powder-Coated]
  • Assembly : Mounting Hardware Included. Hardware may loosen over time, periodically check that all connections are tight.
  • Made in India

storage.Name: Grid Rack - Gold

tables.Name: Harvey Marble Table - Gold
tables.Body:
The Harvey marble nesting table set brings a glamorous feeling to the traditional nest of tables, fusing a marble top with metallic antique brass legs.

Have them nesting together as a set, or scatter them across your living room.

  • Dimensions: Small: 13" DIA x 17" H , Large: 16" DIA x 22" H
  • Material: Marble Top, MS Frame
  • Finish: Gold [Metal Paint]
  • Assembly: Minimal assembly required [Tools included]
  • Made in India

ASSEMBLY INSTRUCTIONS

tables.Name: Harvey Marble Table - Antique
tables.Body:
The Harvey marble nesting table set brings a glamorous feeling to the traditional nest of tables, fusing a marble top with metallic antique brass legs.

Have them nesting together as a set, or scatter them across your living room.

  • Dimensions: Small: 13" DIA x 17" H , Large: 16" DIA x 22" H

  • Assembly: Minimal assembly required [Tools included]

tables.Name: Helen Inlay Marble Table
tables.Body:
Add a touch of maximalist modern style to your living space. The Helen marble round side table with a hairpin frame is perfect for displaying magazines and serving coffee and nibbles by the sofa.

This classic white marble table is inspired by 20th-century furniture icons and is a statement piece of furniture.

Please note: **Due to the nature of the material, the brass inlay will have a slight dark patina and spotting and this will darken with age. This is not a fault and we believe it adds to the beauty of the product**

  • Dimensions: 21.5" DIA x 20" H
  • Material: Marble Top, MS Frame
  • Finish: Antique Brass [Powder Coated]
  • Assembly: Minimal assembly required [Tools included]
  • Made in India

ASSEMBLY INSTRUCTIONS

tables.Name: Kaya Side Table
tables.Body:
Looking to add more surface space to the room? Kaya is a light and airy side table with a twist. The open iron frame square in gold sets off beautifully with the two wood surfaces. The metal frame is sleek and slim and the top has softly rounded edges.

Perfect for living rooms, bedrooms and hallways.

  • Dimensions: 20" L x 15" B x 21" H
  • Materials : Solid Wood and Iron Frame
  • Finish : Light Teak Polish and Matt Gold [Metal Paint]
  • Assembly : Pre-assembled

tables.Name: Arthur Coffee Table
tables.Body:
Beautiful hexagon-shaped  layered coffee table that is accented by a metallic gold base. This table is what modern minimalist dreams are made of.

Each table is handcrafted in our own workshop in solid mango wood.

Please note: **Due to the wood’s natural graining, every top is one-of-a-kind. If purchased as a set, our team will hand-select a complementary combination.**

  • Product Dimensions: Small Table: 24" W x 21" D x 18" H , Large Table: 36" W x 31" D x 15" H
  • Materials : Solid Wood Top, Iron frame
  • Finish : Mahogany Polish, Gold [Metal Paint]
  • Made in India

tables.Name: Emma Black Granite Table
tables.Body:
This designer side table combines a polished black granite table top with a metallic hairpin frame.

The Emma is an elegant marble side table and is perfect for adding a hint of luxury to your home. It provides a beautiful surface for placing your cup of tea or a vase of flowers upon.

  • Dimensions: 21.5" DIA x 20" H
  • Material: Granite Top, MS Frame
  • Finish: Antique Brass [Powder Coated]
  • Assembly: Minimal assembly required [Tools included]
  • Made in India

ASSEMBLY INSTRUCTIONS

tables.Name: Arbor Coffee Table
tables.Body:
Bring a taste of what’s trending to your living room layout with this modern coffee table. Crafted from metal, its frame features a circular base in a gold finish for a hint of glamour. The circular tops are made from high-grade wood and finished with a durable mahogany polish.

This coffee table is ideal for those who want a multi-functional product that complements an evolving, modern lifestyle. It offers extra storage with layered tables, and can be paired with almost any style of sofa.

  • Product Dimensions: Small Table: 24" DIA x 19" H, Large Table: 33" DIA x 16" H
  • Materials: Veneer Top, Iron Frame
  • Finish: Mahogany Polish, Gold [Metal Paint]
  • Made in India

tables.Name: Rae Side Table
tables.Body:
The Rae is a one of a kind side table with a rich mahogany round top and tapered legs with a subtle metallic gold detail. The table is finished in a warm mid-century tone for added texture and to show the table's exaggerated wood graining; making it extra chic.

  • Dimensions:20" DIA x 21" H
  • Materials: Veneer Top, Iron Frame
  • Finish: Mahogany Polish, Gold [Metal Paint]
  • Made in India

tables.Name: Ester Side Table - Antique Brass Frame
tables.Body:
Infuse a room with glamour by adding the Ester Side Table. The frame is finished to an antique brass colour and the top features a beautiful natural wood grain. Beyond the charm of its frame, the beauty of this piece is that it’s large enough for storing taller items, such as vases or a stack of books or records near the sofa.

  • Dimensions: 20" DIA x 20" H
  • Materials : Solid Wood , MS Frame
  • Finish : Teak Polish, Antique Brass [Powder-Coated]
  • Made in India

tables.Name: Mira Side Table
tables.Body:
Meet the smallest member of our table family. The sleek frame is designed to be placed over your lap or the arms of your sofa. 

With its unique C-shaped frame and base, this sleek side table is the perfect match for your sofa or arm chair - while it's brass and teak finish wooden top adds a touch of opulence to the living area.

  • Product Dimensions: 16" W x 16" D x 24" H
  • Materials : Solid Wood, MS Frame
  • Finish : Teak Polish, Shiny Brass [Powder-Coated]
  • Made in India

tables.Name: Larsen Coffee Table
tables.Body:
Characterised by its clean lines and open design, this understated coffee table brings a touch of modern minimalism to your living room.

For fans of all things mid-century modern, this table is sure to deliver. Built from solid wood, this table features a streamlined design with retro curved legs and painted gold metal inserts. A lower shelf offers out-of-sight storage for odds and ends you want to tuck away while the top has enough space for an entertainment spread.

Please note: **Due to the wood’s natural graining, each piece is one-of-a-kind. **

  • Product Dimensions: Table: 48" W x 21" D x 16" H
  • Materials : Veneer + Solid Wood Frame, Metal Inserts
  • Finish : Walnut Polish, Gold [Metal Paint]
  • Made in India

tables.Name: Scott Table
tables.Body:
Grey honed Marble or Black Granite? Which one suits your space?

Reflect your style with these luxurious Mid-Century Modern-inspired nesting tables. The round designs, with their sleek natural stone tops and shiny brass metal frames are just the thing to introduce an intriguing but understated glamour to your space.

  • Dimensions: Large: 16.5" DIA x 22" H, Small: 14" DIA x 18" H
  • Materials : Granite Top, MS Frame
  • Finish : Brass [Powder-Coated]
  • Assembly Instructions: Easy, Minimal assembly required. (tools included)
  • Made in India
ASSEMBLY INSTRUCTIONS

tables.Name: Odin Bedside Table
tables.Body:
Need something sleek by your bedside? Odin is the solution to your bedside storage troubles. Rich mahogany toned polish and subtle brass contrasts - this side table has it all. A roomy drawer keeps this compact piece functional.

The legs are tapered, rounded, and connected by a stylish brass coloured rod. 

  • Product Dimensions: 16" L x 16" D x 21" H
  • Materials : Solid Wood and Iron Rod
  • Finish : Mahogany Polish, Gold [Metal Paint]
  • Made in India

tables.Name: Ralph Bedside Table
tables.Body:
Ralph is an instant classic.

Check out the bevelled edging, honed teak finish and all that detail in the grain. Ralph is an effortless way to add sophisticated style to your space.

  • Product Dimensions: 22" W x 20" D x 20" H
  • Materials: Solid Wood
  • Finish: Teak Polish [Customisable]
  • Made in India

tables.Name: Maya Bedside Table
tables.Body:
Designed with your bedroom in mind, Maya has your bedside storage needs sorted.

Think honed teak finish with a subtle contrast from the metal frame, this bedside table has it all.

  • Product Dimensions: 31" W x 18" D x 17" H
  • Materials: Veneer + Solid Wood, Metal Bar
  • Finish: Teak Polish [Customisable], Matt Black [Metal Paint]
  • Made in India

tables.Name: Jesse Bedside Table
tables.Body:
Jesse is an effortless fusion between mid-century modern and deco styles. Its beautiful curves are elegant and subtle.

The design is complemented with a gorgeous brass gold handle, resulting in a bedside table with serious style. Additionally, Jesse has enough storage to hold all your bedside bits and bobs.

  • Product Dimensions: 18" W x 14" D x 21" H
  • Materials: Solid Wood
  • Finish: Teak Polish [Customisable]
  • Made in India

tables.Name: Tyler Bedside Table
tables.Body:
A great looking piece that is crafted in solid wood and will stand the test of time. Clean lines, sleek design and plenty of storage.

Details are subtle but expressive and nothing has been overlooked. Did we mention the hand made curved handle?

  • Product Dimensions: 24" W x 20" D x 20" H
  • Materials: Veneer + Solid Wood
  • Finish: Teak Polish [Customisable]
  • Made in India

tables.Name: Ryan Bedside Table
tables.Body:
Ryan is a modern twist on traditional elegance. This bedside table is warm and welcoming and it will store all your bedroom bits nicely.

The design is refined but fresh at the same time.

  • Product Dimensions: 18" W x 18" D x 21" H
  • Materials: Veneer + Solid Wood
  • Finish: Teak Polish [Customisable]
  • Made in India

tables.Name: Asher Bedside Table
tables.Body:
Consider the ordinary elevated with Asher - our bedside table that’s easy on the eye. The gorgeous walnut polish, gold handle and skinny tapered legs make this one sophisticated piece.

This bedside table is more than just somewhere to put your coffee.

  • Product Dimensions: 17" W x 16" D x 18" H
  • Materials: Veneer + Solid Wood
  • Finish: Walnut Polish  [Customisable]
  • Made in India

tables.Name: Chester Bedside Table
tables.Body:
Chester brings modern, minimalist vibes to your bedroom. The boxy shape is softened by subtle curved edges and the result is simple but so on trend.

Plus it comes with a large handy drawer to store all your bedtime essentials.

  • Product Dimensions: 28" W x 18" D x 18" H
  • Materials: Veneer + Solid Wood
  • Finish: Walnut Polish [Customisable]
  • Made in India

tables.Name: Ashley Coffee Table - Teak Finish
tables.Body:
The Ashley Coffee Table is racking up all the style points in our book. The sleek top in beautifully grained wood boasts a raised rim that highlights the piece’s curvature while the sleekness of the black metal base provides contrast and industrial appeal. The tops are available in two different finishes – teak stained wood and a neutral grey stain.

The nested two-tier design is both eye-catching and functional, providing visual interest and an extra spot to pile your favourite magazines and living room coffee table books.

  • Product Dimensions: Large Table - 30" DIA x 16" H, Small Table - 21" DIA x 20" H
  • Materials : Solid Wood Top, MS Frame
  • Finish : Teak Polish, Matt Black [Powder Coated]
  • Made in India

tables.Name: Camila Upholstered Coffee Table
tables.Body:
Discover timeless elegance and old-world luxury in your living space with the Camila Coffee Table. Natural Beige Earthy Fabric upholstery in a tufted finish rests on legs that have a unique design that bridges traditional and contemporary aesthetics.

The Camila has an added bonus of storage space - the perfect hiding place for those extra throws, pillows, and linens.

  • Product Dimensions: 48" W x 24" D x 16" H
  • Materials: Plywood + Laminate Upholstered Box, Steam Beech Wood Legs
  • Finish: Cotton Fabric, Natural Polish
  • Made in India

tables.Name: Ashley Coffee Table - Grey Finish
tables.Body:
The Ashley Coffee Table is racking up all the style points in our book. The sleek top in beautifully grained wood boasts a raised rim that highlights the piece’s curvature while the sleekness of the black metal base provides contrast and industrial appeal. The tops are available in two different finishes – teak stained wood and a neutral grey stain. 

The nested two-tier design is both eye-catching and functional, providing visual interest and an extra spot to pile your favourite magazines and living room coffee table books.

  • Product Dimensions: Large Table - 30" DIA x 16" H, Small Table - 21" DIA x 20" H
  • Materials : Solid Wood Top, MS Frame
  • Finish : Neutral Grey Polish, Matt Black [Powder Coated]
  • Made in India

textiles.Name: Tilly Square Cushion - Indigo
textiles.Body:
These hand block printed cushions with strong yet calming tones will make the perfect addition to your interiors. The Diamond, together with the co-ordinating Wave and Tree prints, all have the same calm and serene feel and the range is designed to be mixed together.

Each block-printed cushion is unique, although cushions may be of the same dimensions and shape, the nature of block-printing means no two will be identical!

*Care Instructions: We recommend gentle hand-washing in lukewarm water and drying flat on a towel. The block-printed cover can be ironed on a warm setting, with muslin between the iron and cover.

** Cushion cover only, inside fillers not included.

  • Dimensions: 18" x 18"
  • Material: Cotton Dhurrie
  • Colour: Indigo
  • Made in India

textiles.Name: Pippa Lumbar Pillow
textiles.Body:
The striking Pippa Woven Lumbar Pillow is made from 100% cotton and woven on traditional looms.

We’ve used some of our favourite pastel colours on this one, style it on a sofa or on a bed to add colour, pattern, and texture to your style without going overboard.

*Care Instructions: We recommend gentle hand-washing in lukewarm water and drying flat on a towel. The block-printed cover can be ironed on a warm setting, with muslin between the iron and cover.

** Cushion cover only, inside fillers not included.

  • Dimensions: Medium - 14" x 26" and Long - 14" x 30"
  • Material: Cotton Dhurrie
  • Made in India

textiles.Name: Pippa Lumbar Pillow
textiles.Body:
The striking Pippa Woven Lumbar Pillow is made from 100% cotton and woven on traditional looms.

We’ve used some of our favourite pastel colours on this one, style it on a sofa or on a bed to add colour, pattern, and texture to your style without going overboard.

*Care Instructions: We recommend gentle hand-washing in lukewarm water and drying flat on a towel. The block-printed cover can be ironed on a warm setting, with muslin between the iron and cover.

** Cushion cover only, inside fillers not included.

  • Dimensions: Medium - 14" x 26" and Long - 14" x 30"
  • Material: Cotton Dhurrie
  • Made in India

textiles.Name: Gigi Threadwork Runner
textiles.Body:
The Gigi comes with gorgeous multi coloured accent thread work and is great for adding a boho touch to any living space!

This rug comes also comes in a runner size 4 ft x 6 ft.

*Care Instructions: We recommend gentle hand-washing in lukewarm water and drying the rug flat. It can be ironed on a warm setting, with muslin between the iron and the rug. It can also be spot cleaned.

Please note: Products may vary slightly from one example to the next due to the handmade nature of the products. Please also note that the rug will come folded and may have fold creases which will disappear over time.

  • Dimensions: 6 Feet x 2 Feet
  • Material: Cotton Dhurrie
  • Made in India

textiles.Name: Shibori Floor Cushion
textiles.Body:
This oversized floor cushion is perfect for an occasional perch or for lounging on while reading your favourite book or magazine. The fabric is dyed several times to achieve the deep rich blue. The manual resist Japanese dyeing technique produces the most intricate patterns on the fabric and no Shibori pattern is the same.

  • Dimensions: 22" DIA x 10" H
  • Filling : Foam, Polyfibre
  • Made in India

textiles.Name: Alisa Indigo Dhurrie
textiles.Body:
The Alisa is a mix of two of our design favourites - the colour indigo and block printing. The block printed section is added on only one side for striking contrast.

With a simple pattern and the deep indigo colour, the Alisa adds interest without over-complicating.

*Care Instructions: We recommend gentle hand-washing in lukewarm water and drying the rug flat. It can be ironed on a warm setting, with muslin between the iron and the rug. It can also be spot cleaned.

Please note: Products may vary slightly from one example to the next due to the handmade nature of the products. Please also note that the rug will come folded and may have fold creases which will disappear over time.

  • Dimensions: 6 Feet x 4 Feet
  • Material: Cotton Dhurrie
  • Colour: Indigo
  • Made in India

textiles.Name: Alisa Black Dhurrie
textiles.Body:
The Alisa is a mix of two of our design favourites - the colour black and block printing. The block printed section is added on only one side for striking contrast.

With a simple pattern and the deep black colour, the Alisa adds interest without over-complicating.

*Care Instructions: We recommend gentle hand-washing in lukewarm water and drying the rug flat. It can be ironed on a warm setting, with muslin between the iron and the rug. It can also be spot cleaned.

Please note: Products may vary slightly from one example to the next due to the handmade nature of the products. Please also note that the rug will come folded and may have fold creases which will disappear over time.

  • Dimensions: 6 Feet x 4 Feet
  • Material: Cotton Dhurrie
  • Colour: Black
  • Made in India

textiles.Name: Iris Indigo Dhurrie
textiles.Body:
Our Iris is a great looking classic monochrome block printed dhurrie that fits in brilliantly with so many styles. The simple design looks great in minimal rooms, it is also hard wearing and perfect for high-traffic areas.

*Care Instructions: We recommend gentle hand-washing in lukewarm water and drying the rug flat. It can be ironed on a warm setting, with muslin between the iron and the rug. It can also be spot cleaned.

Please note: Products may vary slightly from one example to the next due to the handmade nature of the products. Please also note that the rug will come folded and may have fold creases which will disappear over time.

  • Dimensions: 6 Feet x 4 Feet
  • Material: Cotton Dhurrie
  • Made in India

textiles.Name: Gigi Threadwork Dhurrie
textiles.Body:
The Gigi comes with gorgeous multi coloured accent thread work and is great for adding a boho touch to any living space!

This rug comes also comes in a runner size 2 ft x 6 ft.

*Care Instructions: We recommend gentle hand-washing in lukewarm water and drying the rug flat. It can be ironed on a warm setting, with muslin between the iron and the rug. It can also be spot cleaned.

textiles.Name: Clover Woven Rug
textiles.Body:
Hand woven by artisans in India, the Clover Runner and Rug are a modern twist on a classic design, they effortlessly fuse contemporary geometrics and modern colours. We’ve combined a cool tone of grey, coral pink and a mint green, and added chunky handmade tassels to finish the look.

*Care Instructions: We recommend gentle hand-washing in lukewarm water and drying the rug flat. It can be ironed on a warm setting, with muslin between the iron and the rug. It can also be spot cleaned. 

Please note: Products may vary slightly from one example to the next due to the handmade nature of the products. Please also note that the rug will come folded and may have fold creases which will disappear over time.

  • Dimensions: 6 Feet x 4 Feet
  • Material: Cotton Dhurrie
  • Made in India

textiles.Name: Layla Turquoise Woven Rug
textiles.Body:
A contemporary classic, our Layla rug is just what’s required to revive a room thanks to its unusual geometric pattern.

This understated linear pattern is hand loomed and is 100% woven cotton, accompanied by charming tassels, it immediately adds character to a room. 

*Care Instructions: We recommend gentle hand-washing in lukewarm water and drying the rug flat. It can be ironed on a warm setting, with muslin between the iron and the rug. It can also be spot cleaned.

Please note: Products may vary slightly from one example to the next due to the handmade nature of the products. Please also note that the rug will come folded and may have fold creases which will disappear over time.

  • Dimensions: 7 Feet x 5 Feet
  • Material: Cotton Dhurrie
  • Made in India

warehouse-sale.Name: Harvey Marble Table - Antique
warehouse-sale.Body:
The Harvey marble nesting table set brings a glamorous feeling to the traditional nest of tables, fusing a marble top with metallic antique brass legs.

Have them nesting together as a set, or scatter them across your living room.

  • Dimensions: Small: 13" DIA x 17" H , Large: 16" DIA x 22" H
  • Material: Marble Top, MS Frame
  • Finish: Antique Brass [Powder Coated]
  • Assembly: Minimal assembly required [Tools included]
  • Made in India

ASSEMBLY INSTRUCTIONS

warehouse-sale.Name: Helen Inlay Marble Table
warehouse-sale.Body:
Add a touch of maximalist modern style to your living space. The Helen marble round side table with a hairpin frame is perfect for displaying magazines and serving coffee and nibbles by the sofa.

This classic white marble table is inspired by 20th-century furniture icons and is a statement piece of furniture.

Please note: **Due to the nature of the material, the brass inlay will have a slight dark patina and spotting and this will darken with age. This is not a fault and we believe it adds to the beauty of the product**

  • Dimensions: 21.5" DIA x 20" H
  • Material: Marble Top, MS Frame
  • Finish: Antique Brass [Powder Coated]
  • Assembly: Minimal assembly required [Tools included]
  • Made in India

Use in front of a dresser or as additional seating in a living room. The design is an easy fit for a vintage, modern or contemporary styled interior.

warehouse-sale.Name: Willow Organiser
warehouse-sale.Body:
If you are stationary hoarders (we are guilty!) then we have for you the perfect solution for tidying up. The Willow Organiser set has three pieces, buy any one of them or get the set and clear the desk of an array of pens, rulers, bits of paper and anything else you fancy. The letter holder is a personal favourite!

Our range of wire products is carefully made by hand by experienced craftsmen. The criss-crossing angular wires create interesting detail making it decorative as well as functional.

  • Letter Holder Dimensions - 7.25" W x 4" D x  5" H
  • Paper Tray Dimensions - 12" W x  14.5" D x 3" H
  • Finish - Powder Coated Copper Finish
  • Made in India
